alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Madison; Scott; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 3:24AM CDT until March 12 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR LEAKE...ATTALA...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT...EAST CENTRAL YAZOO AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 324 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hesterville to near Newport to near Tinsley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Kosciusko, Newport and Hesterville around 330 AM CDT. Thomastown around 335 AM CDT. Carthage and Singleton around 340 AM CDT. Canton and Renfroe around 350 AM CDT. Edinburg, Way and Zama around 355 AM CDT. Sharon around 400 AM CDT. Farmhaven around 410 AM CDT. Ludlow around 415 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lena, Walnut Grove, Mccool, Ethel, Redwater and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
